static function defineModel($name,  
$parent =  'AN_Model')
Defines a model at runtime allowing for models to be used without the need to create a class for each one.

$callback,  
$defaults =  array(),

static function run($url =  null)
Calls the first matched route for $url.
static function underscore($str)
Converts string to lowercase and replaces lowercase letter followed by a uppercase letter with the lowercase version of both separated by an underscore.
static function url($params,  
$method =  'get')
Converts the given parameters into a URL appropriate for a link.
